meanings: (잘 이용함) [명사] application, practical use, [동사] use, (formal) utilize, make (good) use of, put sth to (good) use, (formal) avail ones...
(문법) [명사] (어미 변화) inflection, inflexion; (동사의) conjugation; (격변화) declension, [동사] inflect, conjugate, decline
use time as efficiently as possible
get the most out of the time
